title.narrative: Sustainable Mechanism for Improving Livelihoods & Household Empowerment (SMILE)

description.narrative: (Nigeria): The aim of SMILE is to improve the wellbeing of OVCs in PEPFAR priority states by enabling them to fully access and utilize comprehensive and coordinated services. SMILE will integrate TB services into its existing mandate in two states (Benue and Nassarawa) by screening vulnerable children for TB, and linking them to designated diagnostic and treatment facilities. The project will develop and implement context specific communication strategies in the communities where they work to improve awareness of TB..
